metadata.name: The Body And The Rain
metadata.description:
Dear collector, you are buying a high-quality still image, specially selected by the artist, from the 360° full-dome immersive performance The Face Of The Rain awarded by SAT FEST 2021 and exhibited at SAT - Société des Arts Technologiques. Montréal, QC, Canada, 2021. 

Created and performed by Marcella França.
The Face of the Rain” is a 360° full-dome immersive performance in a 3D point cloud with generative and interactive effects that talk about memory, the life cycle, and the concept of non-linear time through the realization that we are all born from water and become rain after our death. The artist Marcella França mixes contemporary dance and digital art, to offer a poetic experience about mourning. 

​
